#include<cstdio>
#include<iostream>
#include<vector>
#include<list>

#define tr(c,i) for(typeof((c).begin()) i = (c).begin(); i != (c).end(); i++) 

using namespace std;

int visited[100005];

void dfs(list<int> a[],int i){
	visited[i]=-1;
		tr(a[i],it){
			if(visited[*it]==0)
				dfs(a,*it);
		}
	visited[i]=1;
}				
int main(){
	int t,n,e,start,end,c;
	scanf("%d",&t);
	while(t--){
		c=0;
		scanf("%d",&n);
		scanf("%d",&e);
		list<int> a[n];
		for(int i=0;i<e;i++){
			scanf("%d %d",&start,&end);
 			a[start].push_back(end);
 			a[end].push_back(start);
 		}
 		for(int i=0;i<n;i++)
 			visited[i]=0;
 		for(int i=0;i<n;i++){
 			if(visited[i]==0){
 				c++;
 				dfs(a,i);
 			}
 		}
 		printf("%d\n",c);
 	}
 	return 0;
 }
